nodes.documentation:
@title Provides addresses of the live contracts implementing certain interfaces. 
@dev Examples are the Oracle or Store interfaces.
nodes.name: Finder

nodes.documentation: @dev Updates the address of the contract that implements `interfaceName`.
nodes.name: changeImplementationAddress

nodes.documentation: @dev Gets the address of the contract that implements the given `interfaceName`.
nodes.name: getImplementationAddress

nodes.documentation:
@title Provides addresses of the live contracts implementing certain interfaces. 
@dev Examples are the Oracle or Store interfaces.
nodes.name: Finder

nodes.documentation: @dev Updates the address of the contract that implements `interfaceName`.
nodes.name: changeImplementationAddress

nodes.documentation: @dev Gets the address of the contract that implements the given `interfaceName`.
nodes.name: getImplementationAddress

devdoc.details: Examples are the Oracle or Store interfaces.

addMember(uint256,address).details: Reverts if `roleId` does not represent an initialized, shared role or if the caller is not a member of the managing role for `roleId`.

changeImplementationAddress(bytes32,addr.details: Updates the address of the contract that implements `interfaceName`.

getImplementationAddress(bytes32).details: Gets the address of the contract that implements the given `interfaceName`.

getMember(uint256).details: Reverts if `roleId` does not represent an initialized, exclusive role.

holdsRole(uint256,address).details: Reverts if roleId does not correspond to an initialized role.

removeMember(uint256,address).details: Reverts if `roleId` does not represent an initialized, shared role or if the caller is not a member of the managing role for `roleId`.

resetMember(uint256,address).details: Reverts if the caller is not a member of the managing role for `roleId` or if `roleId` is not an initialized, exclusive role.

devdoc.title: Provides addresses of the live contracts implementing certain interfaces.

getMember(uint256).notice: Gets the current holder of the exclusive role, `roleId`.

holdsRole(uint256,address).notice: Whether `memberToCheck` is a member of roleId.

resetMember(uint256,address).notice: Changes the exclusive role holder of `roleId` to `newMember`.
